channel.title: What analytics / tracking does RadixTalk use?
channel.description:
RadixTalk uses https://plausible.io/privacy-focused-web-analytics to track website usage. Plausible is open source, does not collect any personally identifiable information (PII), and does not use cookies (no cookie banners :raised_hands:). All collected data is aggregated only and completely anonymous.
https://plausible.io/
